Door.synopsis: The door to enter the armoury is closed and locked tight. People on the other side can be heard conversing about the impending catastrophe. Players can break in or attempt to convince the people inside to run for their lives.

Door_4.speaker: Tilly
Door_4.text: If you're going to do it, just make it quick!

Door_56.speaker: Player
Door_56.text: I'm not here to kill you.

Door_72.speaker: Player
Door_72.text: Didn't you hear? I'm the mind flayer that's going to save you all.

Door_87.speaker: Player
Door_87.text: Just because it's a mind flayer you think it's a murderer?

Door_57.speaker: Player
Door_57.text: Don't look at it like that - that's the mind flayer that's going to save the city.

Door_32.speaker: Tilly
Door_32.text: Just like that? You're not going to... suck our brains out?

Door_80.speaker: Robyn
Door_80.text: Don't question it, Tilly. Just GO.

Door_45.speaker: Tilly
Door_45.text: If you try that again, we'll - we'll - we'll blow you up!
Door_45.context: NodeContext: Spoken from behind a locked door

Door_100.speaker: Robyn
Door_100.context: NodeContext: hissed whisper (Spoken from behind a locked door)

Door_51.speaker: Tilly
Door_51.context: NodeContext: Spoken from behind a locked door

Door_81.speaker: Tilly
Door_81.text: (There's an ogre out there, Robyn. I heard it. We'll never make it...)
Door_81.context: CinematicNodeContext: Spoken from behind a locked door, so we don't see them. NodeContext: Spoken from behind a locked door

Door_73.speaker: Robyn
Door_73.text: (Well, we can't just stay in here until we rot, can we?)
Door_73.context: NodeContext: Spoken from behind a locked door, hushed tones

Door_1.speaker: Civilian
Door_1.text: (Shut it! Both of you! I hear someone.)
Door_1.context: NodeContext: Spoken from behind a locked door, hushed tones

Door_86.speaker: Narrator
Door_86.text: *The door is locked from the inside.*

Door_53.speaker: Player
Door_53.text: Enjoy being burned to death by nautiloids, then.

Door_69.speaker: Robyn
Door_69.context: NodeContext: just wants us to be gone (Spoken from behind a locked door)

Door_13.speaker: Tilly
Door_13.context: NodeContext: scared shitless (Spoken from behind a locked door, hushed tones)

Door_28.speaker: Player
Door_28.text: You need to leave! This whole place is falling down.

Door_90.speaker: Tilly
Door_90.text: (Oh, gods... I knew the blasts were getting closer...)
Door_90.context: CinematicNodeContext: Talking amonst themselves inside the room.NodeContext: Spoken from behind a locked door

Door_103.speaker: Tilly
Door_103.text: (We should open up - it's the quickest way out.)
Door_103.context: CinematicNodeContext: Talking amonst themselves inside the room.NodeContext: Spoken from behind a locked door

Door_89.speaker: Robyn
Door_89.text: (Ugh. Guess it's better than dying under a pile of rubble.)
Door_89.context: CinematicNodeContext: Talking amonst themselves inside the room.NodeContext: Spoken from behind a locked door (hushed tones)

Door_102.speaker: Robyn
Door_102.context: CinematicNodeContext: Yelling out through the door to the player.NodeContext: Spoken from behind a locked door - yelled out to the player

Door_38.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sounds of latches being pulled. The door opens up.

Door_11.speaker: Tilly
Door_11.text: Robyn, it's... it's a mind flayer.

Door_0.speaker: Robyn
Door_0.text: You can breathe later, Tilly. Let's go.

Door_3.speaker: Player
Door_3.text: Go on, get out of here.

Door_10.speaker: Tilly
Door_10.text: Thank you. You're getting to safety too, right?

Door_104.speaker: Tilly
Door_104.text: I don't think they are. They're heading toward the worst of it.

Door_49.speaker: Tilly
Door_49.text: Here - protection for you and your friends.

Door_25.speaker: Player
Door_25.text: Not so fast. I'd actually quite like you to die.

Door_37.speaker: Robyn
Door_37.context: NodeContext: Spoken from behind a locked door

Door_46.speaker: Tilly
Door_46.text: (Robyn, what do we do? What do we do?)
Door_46.context: NodeContext: Spoken from behind a locked door

Door_101.speaker: Robyn
Door_101.text: We open up, godsdammit. (And then we run.)
Door_101.context: NodeContext: second line whispered with intent to be out of earshot (Spoken from behind a locked door)

Door_48.speaker: Robyn
Door_48.context: NodeContext: Spoken from behind a locked door

Door_16.speaker: Player
Door_16.text: Let me in! The mind flayers are after me!

Door_74.speaker: Tilly
Door_74.text: (We've got to help them! It could have been one of us.)
Door_74.context: NodeContext: Spoken from behind a locked door

Door_5.speaker: Robyn
Door_5.context: NodeContext: Spoken from behind a locked door (hushed tones)

Door_96.speaker: Robyn
Door_96.text: Seriously? Do you think we're stupid or something?
Door_96.context: NodeContext: Spoken from behind a locked door

Door_62.speaker: Robyn
Door_62.context: NodeContext: Spoken from behind a locked door (hushed tones)

Door_60.speaker: Robyn
Door_60.text: Whoever you are, just - just - leave us alone!
Door_60.context: NodeContext: Spoken from behind a locked door

Door_85.speaker: Tilly
Door_85.context: NodeContext: hissed whisper (Spoken from behind a locked door)

Door_105.speaker: Robyn
Door_105.text: Back off! We've got bombs in here and we're not afraid to use them!
Door_105.context: NodeContext: Spoken from behind a locked door

Door_59.speaker: Player
Door_59.text: If you want to die in there, be my guest.

Door_84.speaker: Tilly
Door_84.context: NodeContext: Not fine, and not grateful, just relieved to be left in peace. (Spoken from behind a locked door)

Door_18.speaker: Player
Door_18.text: You're going to die in there if you don't leave soon!

Door_67.speaker: Tilly
Door_67.text: Think we haven't heard that one before? Piss off.
Door_67.context: NodeContext: Spoken from behind a locked door

Door_65.speaker: Tilly
Door_65.context: NodeContext: Spoken from behind a locked door

Door_2.speaker: Civilian
Door_2.context: NodeContext: Spoken from behind a locked door
